short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser plugin that provides users a quick way to access to the different PMI applications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plugin provides a quick and easy access to all PMI (Philip Morris International) tools by showing a toolbar in the top of your browser. The plugin will only be visible and displayed, in the websites that are authorized by PMI company.
